channel.title: [WDOTM] Speed Coding. (Preliminaries)
channel.description:
While we're waiting on the other WDOTM to finish and everyone to zip up their work (especially me... sorry guys), we'll get another WDOTM in place.
We're going to set down a date where all/most contestants can have a few hours of uninterrupted time. At the beginning of the set time, everyone gets an image. It is your job to cut it up, slice it, and/or beat it into a website.
Some criteria for judging: - Unzipped size. (You can't win with an image map. Nothing personal, FastBawlz. :P) - Standards compliance. (HTML 4.0, XHTML 1.1, preferably Strict.) - Resemblance to the stock. (Of course, if you make a change for the better, no one will complain.)
However, at this preliminary stage, all we are doing is setting up a time and date to hold this. So post general times/dates when you would be free from now until Jan 17th. If you can do this whenever, there's no need to RSVP or anything, you can walk in as the event starts and participate.

item.title: [WDOTM] Speed Coding. (Preliminaries)
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

It would be easier making a poll with:

Monday: 4pm - 9pm
Tuesday: 4pm - 9pm
Wednesday: 4pm - 9pm
Thursday: 4pm - 9pm
Friday: 4pm - 8pm
Saturday: 12pm - 10pm sporadically
Sunday: 2pm - 4pm, 7pm - 9pm

And have people vote for it.

Any time now.

Read full topic

item.title: [WDOTM] Speed Coding. (Preliminaries)
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

I never know EXACTLY when I have time.

New things keep coming up and changing my calendar. For example, I just got a speeding ticket and have to be in court on January 16th.

As for this week, I am busy almost all week. I will possibly be available this next Monday from like 1-4 EST but I am not positive.

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: [WDOTM] Speed Coding. (Preliminaries)
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

If your busy I’ll post it.

[quote=“kloplop321, post:31, topic:165650”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=224711.msg1939109#msg1939109 date=1198040786]

we must have a layered image, because everyone would be trying to restore the image durring that time, and no progress will happen.

And it is highly impossible to have everybody on at the same time, since some of us are Americans, from the Neaderlands, the UK, Ausie, New Zealand and so forth.

It would be more like speed slicing, not speed coding in that sense.

Netherlands*

Me and Legit already finished a template, we’ll be posting the PSD + PNG later.
[/quote]
Not in their language
http://www.google.nl/
google knows all :D[/quote]

Either way you spelled it “Neaderlands” not “Nederlands”

Read full topic

item.title: [WDOTM] Speed Coding. (Preliminaries)
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Ok, could everyone just post when they are free? Example:

Monday: 4pm - 9pm
Tuesday: 4pm - 9pm
Wednesday: 4pm - 9pm
Thursday: 4pm - 9pm
Friday: 4pm - 8pm
Saturday: 12pm - 10pm sporadically
Sunday: 2pm - 4pm, 7pm - 9pm

I may be busy during the holidays. And I will not be available on Jan 13th.

Preferably EST, but otherwise include the timezone (GMT -0500).

Read full topic
